reviews.review: Portal 2 is one of my personal favorite games, i used to play the crap out of this game back in xbox 360 days.
Thought I could complete whole run in 1 play, biggest mistake in my life.
Almost 10 years has passed since release of this wonderful game. What is your problem with number 3, Valve?

sup this game is fantastic and ive played portal stories mel its free for you guys who have played this and also (spoilers) you have to defeat wheatly Glados at de end so i enjoyed doing that sadly i saved in a pit of death at chapteer 6 and i cant get out of it it keeps killing me. so sadly i had to start again D: but luckily i did it and i bought it in the pack with the sale and portal is cool enough but this one i am shocked to see its changed and bought alot of people playing it so i really reconmend this game :D also whilst im here lett me explain the bugs and easter eggs. well first of all i reconmend this game cuz it has no bugs and secondly i found a couple but not all of them i dont think. (spoilers again) its behind a pannel flap in chapter 4 test chamber i forgot anyway plz play this game when u have chance to. i wasted my time writing this so plz like or doslike idk. so this game is beast. get ti in the pack it is 10 pounds in relaity and on sale its arounds 2

The game is really fun. Solving tough puzzles is rewarding especially when you start doing the workshop ones. I thought the concept was going to break my brain at first but when I tried the game, it wasn't as tough to understand as I thought.
Played this game again after 9 years and still is a very unique game.
9/10 Based ending. A little dragged out near the end. Loved the puzzles, loved the co-op.
Great story, engaging all the way through
Жалко, что нет продолжения, но я надеюсь, что жадный Габен отдаст нам продолжение истории Чел. Игра отличная 10/10
one of the best games out there in my opinion

the portal games have a rep for a reason. i think i liked portal 2 even better than the first, the overwhelming dread mixed with complete absurdity and hijinks is just perfect. not too difficult either, i think anyone can finish it if they wanted

There's a reason why all portal/half-life games are well known as "The Best"

Şimdi bu oyunu alıyorsunuz, 4-5 bulmacayı çözüyorsunuz daha sonra beyninizin yetmediğini farkedip youtubeden bakıyorsunuz. Ya da bakmıyorsunuz, noclip açıp geçiyorsunuz. Ya da sikerim böyle oyunu diyerek oyunu kapatma eyleminde bulunuyorsunuz.
非常棒的游戏，不管是画面还是玩法都是当时相当高的水准。剧情玩一天，创意工坊玩一年，有个好兄弟开黑简直不要太快乐。注意双人模式一定要两人都是英文ID，否则一进就闪退。
Yes. Portal 3 never gonna happen. Enjoy the game because 3 is a cursed number.
Partnerinizle portaldan portala geçip beyin yormak istiyorsanız güzel bir oyun :)

Absolutely 10/10
x2 more difficult than the first series. Highly recommended.
The game is now only $1.5 on steam sale. Go grab it while it last.
Лучшая головоломка, которая заставляет не только подумать, но проникнуться и насладится сюжетом! Топ советую всем.

An amazing classic that is still one of the best games ever. Go solo or partner up in this enjoyable, perplexing puzzler. Multiple levels to play with a fantastic story with community made levels.

Best puzzle game of all time. Nuff said

Un masterclass du DÉBUT jusqu'à la FIN. Les personnages sont hyper charismatiques, attachants et drôles au possible. L'histoire n'est pas répétitive (assez dur à produire dans ce type de jeu) et très bien construite. Des zones cachés et beaucoup de petits détails qui vous font comprendre de mieux en mieux le pourquoi du comment en temps réel. Les tests sont très réussi avec un niveau de difficulté juste parfait. Le générique de Portal 2 est tout autant réussi que celui de Portal. Des jeux comme cela c'est une expérience unique.
im bad at puzzle games but coop was fun

Perfection. Just perfection. The gameplay, the story and performances, the visuals, the sound and music, how all those aspects work together and complement each other, everything about this game is just perfect!

Одна из лучших игр-головоломок (да и вообще игр) в принципе! Ещё с детства мне понравилась первая часть серии, которая проходилась всего за час-полтора. Здесь же.. Здесь всё отполировано фактически до ИДЕАЛА : графика, и по сей день радующая глаз (игре более 8 лет), интересный сюжет, харизматичные и запоминающиеся герои, сбалансированные квесты, невероятно увлекательный кооператив - всё это здесь, в Portal 2! В наши дни таких легендарных игр выходит достаточно мало, но Valve просто заставили меня боготворить эту игру! Твёрдая 10!
